word_mean: 响尾蛇：即任何一种美洲沟蝰(New World pit vipers)，属于响尾蛇属(Crotalus和侏响尾蛇属(Sistrurus)，尾端有一连串相连的角样节段，受到惊扰时振动尾部产生具有特点的“格、格”和“咝咝”声.见附表snake

entry.def: A rattlesnake is a poisonous American snake which can make a rattling noise with its tail.

example.ex: He had been bitten by a rattlesnake.

means.word_mean: 1. pit viper with horny segments at the end of the tail that rattle when shaken
